name: Treadmill
description: The Treadmill is a staple cardio machine for improving cardiovascular health and endurance. Whether you are walking, jogging, or sprinting, the treadmill allows you to control the intensity and incline for a personalized workout.

howToPerform: Start with a walking or jogging pace, adjusting the speed and incline to suit your fitness level.
Focus on maintaining proper posture, engaging your core, and using your arms to help drive momentum.
variants: Incline Walk: Increase the incline for a challenging uphill workout without increasing speed.
HIIT Intervals: Alternate between sprinting and walking to improve cardiovascular endurance.
Backward Walk: Walk backward at a slow pace to challenge different leg muscles.
